result.name: BAFF SNPs and fatigue in primary SS patients
result.description: An investigation into the association of BAFF variants with fatigue development in the setting of primary Sjogren's Syndrome (SS). Analysis performed in a cohort of 199 Greek primary SS patients, in a validation cohort of 62 Dutch primary SS patients and in a cohort of 52 Greek Multiple Sclerosis (MS) patients that served as disease controls.
result.center: School of Medicine, National and Kapodistrian University of Athens
